meanings.definition: To pick or select by hand.
meanings.sent1: She handpicks the ripest apples from the tree.
meanings.sent2: I handpick the best flowers for the bouquet.
meanings.sent3: The chef handpicks the freshest herbs for his special dish.
meanings.sent4: He handpicks the most talented musicians for his band.
meanings.sent5: The farmer handpicks each strawberry with care.

meanings.sent1: The curator handpicks the artworks for the exhibition.
meanings.sent2: I handpick my outfits for important events.
meanings.sent3: She handpicks the funniest jokes for her comedy show.
meanings.sent4: He handpicks the top students for the science project.
meanings.sent5: The coach handpicks the players for the championship game.
